decision_reasoning: Chen had the opportunity to address concerns in her submissions
application_details: Chen argued that the PCDO breached fairness by not disclosing the risk analysis and documents
cause_of_action: Chen claimed she faced risks if returned to China and sought membership in the PDRCC class but was denied
procedure_followed: Chen applied for judicial review after the PCDO's decision
The Federal Court analyzed whether procedural fairness was upheld
